titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for a solemne fast on Wednesday the fifth of February next, upon occasion of the present treaty for peace.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Oxford, this 27 day of January, in the twentieth yeare of Our Raigne. 1644.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
